content: भटः [भट्-अच्] {@--1@} A warrior, soldier, combatant; तद्भटचातुरीतुरी <ls>N. 1. 12</ls>; वादित्रसृष्टिर्घटते भटस्य <ls n="N.">22. 22</ls>; <ls>Bk. 14. 101.</ls> {@--2@} A mercenary, hired soldier, hireling. {@--3@} An outcast, a barbarian. {@--4@} A demon. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of a degraded tribe. --टा Coloquintida (इंद्रवारुणी).
